text: Holding You Feels So Good (TC: 抱著你感覺很好) is a Cantopop album by Edmond Leung. ==Track listing== #Love and Affection (愛與情) #One Night Only (只得一晚) #More or Less (多多少少) #Everything Start From Wayward (一切從任性開始) #Impatient (心急) #Deep Affection and Distraction (情深意亂) #Accompany Your Life (陪你一生) #Regret (遺憾) #I Want To Know (我想知) #Three Broken Hearts (傷了三個心) ==Charts== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- | IFPI Hong Kong GroupBillboard 16 Dec 1995 | align="center"|6 |} ==References== Category:Edmond Leung albums Category:1995 albums
title: Holding You Feels So Good
